search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Descript (descript.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Descript is: [https://www.descript.com/pricing](https://www.descript.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
What’s the difference?
----------------------

Transcription

Transcription hours (per editor)

Number of hours of automated transcription included on your plan per editor. These hours pool together for all editors on the drive.

1 hr maximum / mo

10 hours / month

30 hours / month

40 hours / month

Multi-language transcription

Automatically transcribe your recordings into text in 25 languages, including Catalan, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English (US), Finnish, French (FR), German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malay, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese (BR), Romanian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish (US), Swedish, and Turkish.

25 languages

25 languages

25 languages

25 languages

Detect 8+ speakers

Automatically identify and label multiple speakers in a recording. Speaker Detective assists you by playing a clip of each speaker to name.

![Image 1](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 2](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 3](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 4](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Multitrack transcription

Automatically transcribe multiple synchronized recordings with speakers on separate tracks and get precise speaker labeling and transcription accuracy. You can also export sessions while retaining separate tracks for editing workflows.

![Image 5](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 6](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 7](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 8](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Transcription glossary

Create a custom dictionary of words or phrases you regularly use to improve the accuracy of transcription.

![Image 9](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 10](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 11](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 12](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Editing

Projects

Unlimited

Unlimited

Unlimited

Unlimited

Dynamic captions

Automatically create animated captions for your videos. Choose from our stock caption styles or customize the font, colors, word highlighting, and positioning, to make your videos accessible and engaging.

Unlimited

Unlimited

Unlimited

Unlimited

Animation

Animate layers using a variety of stock animations or create your own custom animations

![Image 13](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 16](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Underlord: AI assistant

Basic AI Suite

5 uses

20 uses / month

Unlimited

Unlimited

Studio sound

Instantly improve audio quality of any recording with one click – remove background noise, enhance speech, and get studio-quality sound without a professional setup.

![Image 17](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 18](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 19](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 20](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Green screen

Instantly remove the background from any video without the need for a physical green screen or complicated chroma key editing.

![Image 21](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 22](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 23](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 24](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Filler word removal

Use AI to instantly highlight and remove "um," "ah," "like", repeated words, and more from your audio and video recordings.

![Image 25](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 26](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 27](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 28](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Shorten word gaps

Shrink or cut silences & lapses in conversation

![Image 29](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 30](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 31](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 32](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Repurpose media: Create clips, highlights

Underlord picks your most viral-worthy moments & makes clips that pop

![Image 33](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 34](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 35](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 36](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Edit for clarity

Remove filler words, digressions, blather — all the obvious cuts

![Image 37](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 38](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Remove retakes

Cut all but your best takes

![Image 41](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Automatic multicam

Automatically pick layouts & cameras to show active conversations

![Image 45](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Center active speaker

Keep the active speaker smack-dab in the center

![Image 49](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Image generation

Describe any image you can imagine; Underlord will create it for you

![Image 53](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 54](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Publish: Draft social posts, blog posts, show notes, summarize

Generate engaging social media text posts, video descriptions, podcast summaries with timestamps, and more to promote your content.

![Image 57](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

![Image 58](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Write: Brainstorm, rewrite, write a script/outline

Hone your ideas by asking Underlord questions and get a first draft, fast.

![Image 61](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

AI video maker: Generate a video with ChatGPT

Transform your ideas into videos in minutes using GPT-generated scripts and visuals, plus Descript's text-to-speech narration.

![Image 65](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Advanced AI Suite

Not available

Eye contact

We use AI to subtly adjust your gaze so it appears that you are looking directly into the camera. Read off your script, screen, or teleprompter without worrying about memorizing or endless retakes.

Separate cloud backup recordings for every session

Backup cloud recordings will be captured and automatically uploaded to the project for every recording, in addition to the high fidelity primary recordings.

Screen recording

Up to 2 screens can be shared and recorded simultaneously.

![Image 93](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Automatic project setup

Each Rooms recording session will automatically be imported into Rooms, transcribed (without spending your Tx minutes), and configured in a sequence.

![Image 97](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Guest file recovery

If a guest’s recording stalls for whatever reason, they will be able to resume uploading their primary recording for up to 7 days after the session.

![Image 101](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Layouts

Use stock layout packs

Choose from a gallery of layouts, including titles, captions, intros, and slides, to quickly make your videos shine.

![Image 105](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2F5a0f91a9340246ff89cf3b45469635ee?width=20)

Collaboration

Seats

Each plan includes a set number of seats. Upgrade to add more teammates as your needs grow.

Basic members

Basic memberships allow you to add team members who can view Descript projects, add comments, and use the Quick recorder for free — but can’t edit projects created by others, which requires an editor membership.

Management & security

Support

In-app live chat support

Live chat support inside the Descript app with our customer support team is available Monday through Friday from 5:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Pacific Time.

![Image 129](https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets%2Ffcea5005d671451e9b07839c893228d0%2Fe043b2a5ae7644059f9f77479fa6aea5?width=20)

Priority support (with SLA)

Get support with guaranteed response times. Our Service Level Agreement (SLA) ensures questions addressed promptly by our dedicated customer support team.

### Frequently asked questions

*   Can I purchase additional transcription hours?![Image 137: down chevron icon](https://descript-website.vercel.app//images/chevron-down-light.svg)
    
    By default, the Descript Hobbyist plan has a monthly transcription limit of 10 hours per editor. The Descript Creator plan has a monthly transcription limit of 30 hours per user. This helps us moderate demand and ensure a fast turnaround for everyone
    
    If you’re looking for a permanent change to your monthly hours, you can increase your transcription limit at $2 per hour [here](https://web.descript.com/subscription).
    
    If you need a set amount of hours added to a given month, e.g., for a backlog of work coming through the pipeline, submit a request [here](https://help.descript.com/hc/en-us/articles/10255869838605-Adding-more-transcription-hours-to-your-account) and we can add hours as a one-time boost to your account at a rate of $2.50 per hour.
    
*   What if we want our full team to collaborate and provide feedback in Descript, but they don't need to edit?![Image 138: down chevron icon](https://descript-website.vercel.app//images/chevron-down-light.svg)
    
    Descript's Basic Seats are what you need. The Business plan includes free Basic members.
    
    Basic members can view and comment on projects, use our screen recorder, and have limited editing permissions in a private workspace. It's ideal for those who need to be involved in the creative process but don't need full editing access.
    
    ‍
    
    Plus, you can easily upgrade Basic Seat members to Editors, giving them full editing capabilities as your project or team evolves.
    
    [‍Learn more about Basic Seats](https://help.descript.com/hc/en-us/articles/10163662152589-Drive-membership-types) and how they make it easy to involve your entire team without adding cost.
    
    The Hobbyist and Creator plans include Viewer members. They can view and comment on shared projects. They cannot create or edit projects on their own.
    
*   I’m interested in setting up an Enterprise plan for my business. Where can I learn more?![Image 139: down chevron icon](https://descript-website.vercel.app//images/chevron-down-light.svg)
    
*   Do I need to enter a credit card to try Descript?![Image 140: down chevron icon](https://descript-website.vercel.app//images/chevron-down-light.svg)
    
    No, Descript's Free plan includes everything you need to record, transcribe, edit and mix audio and video content. If you'd like to continue transcribing after using your monthly 1 hour, you can upgrade to a paid plan and receive up to 30 hours of automatic transcription each month.
    
*   How are subscription payments processed?![Image 141: down chevron icon](https://descript-website.vercel.app//images/chevron-down-light.svg)
    
    Descript Hobbyist, Creator, and Business plan subscriptions are processed automatically to the credit card you provide, according to your selected billing cycle. Users requiring custom invoicing options (such as ACH transfer) can reach out to our [Enterprise team](https://www.descript.com/enterprise) to learn more.
    
*   Do you offer special rates for students, educators, and non-profits?![Image 142: down chevron icon](https://descript-website.vercel.app//images/chevron-down-light.svg)
    
*   How does Descript protect my privacy?![Image 143: down chevron icon](https://descript-website.vercel.app//images/chevron-down-light.svg)
    
    Your Project Information is confidential, even from Descript. We are SOC 2 Type II compliant. Read more about [Descript Security](https://www.descript.com/security).
    
*   How do I cancel my subscription?![Image 144: down chevron icon](https://descript-website.vercel.app//images/chevron-down-light.svg)
    
    You can easily cancel your subscription from your [Descript subscription page](https://web.descript.com/subscription). You can also delete your account and permanently wipe your data from our servers.

Get started with Descript to write, record, edit, publish podcasts & videos for free. Or pick from any of our paid plans starting at $12 per month.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes subscription tiers with varying features and usage limits.
